Note: Caritas paciens est, beningna est, etc. written to right.
_description: The Sixteen Points of Charity — eight couplets paraphrasing I Cor.13:4-8 in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.First Lines:
Charite is brithe of wordCharite is milde of
                    mod…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Charite suffret alle þinggeCharite lestet withouten
                    endingge
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 10-11.
